sentences.en: And for the moment, Leehom seems to have hit the jackpot.
sentences.cn: 而此时, 王力宏似乎压对宝、投对资了!

sentences.en: But jackpot winners'advice is: Don't give up work.
sentences.cn: 中了头彩的幸运儿们的建议是: 不要放弃工作.

sentences.en: Celion Dion hit the jackpot by singing the theme song of Titanic.
sentences.cn: 席林?迪翁因唱《泰坦尼克号》主题曲而红遍全球.

sentences.en: If we have a winning ticket, we will split the jackpot evenly.
sentences.cn: 如果我们有一张中奖的彩票, 我们将平分.

sentences.en: Larry hit jackpot when he discovered oil on his land.
sentences.cn: 拉里发了,他在自家地里发现了石油.

sentences.en: Larry hit the jackpot when he discovered oil on his land.
sentences.cn: 拉里在自己的地里发现了石油,发了大财.

sentences.en: Supposing you won the jackpot, what would you do with it?
sentences.cn: 假定你中了大奖, 你会做什么?

sentences.en: The jackpot can be yours if you pick the six winning numbers.
sentences.cn: 要是你挑中了六个幸运号码,头彩就是你的了.

sentences.en: The lottery jackpot reached $ 150 million + not long ago.
sentences.cn: 彩票累计奖金不久前达到了1.5亿美元以上.

sentences.en: the theatre hit the jackpot with its first musical.
sentences.cn: 剧院的首部音乐喜剧一举成功。

sentences.en: The winner will split the record of 370 million - dollar jackpot.
sentences.cn: 赢家将打破370,000,000美元累计赌注的记录.

sentences.en: The winners will split record 370 million - dollar jackpot.
sentences.cn: 中奖者将分享创记录的370百万美元的累积奖金.

sentences.en: The winners will split the record 370 million dollar jackpot.
sentences.cn: 获奖者将分享创下记录的累计3.7亿的头等大奖.

sentences.en: This guy won a million - dollar jackpot on a game show.
sentences.cn: 这家伙在一场比赛中赢得了一百万美元的奖金.

sentences.en: What about those lucky few who do win a lottery jackpot?
sentences.cn: 那些少数幸运赢得彩票头彩奖金的人 呢 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 赢得大笔钱；获得巨大成功

phrases.phrase: hit the jackpot informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 获得巨大（或意外）的成功（尤指迅速赚得一大笔钱）

trans.tran_cn: 头奖的；累积赌注的；大笔收入的
赌注，头奖，最大成功，积累的赌金，困境
trans.tran_en: a large amount of money that you can win in a game that is decided by chance
